attributes.action: Form the Canzuk Union with Canada, New Zealand and Australia
attributes.additional_details:
All countries are similar all being capitalist and democratic along with a shared Anglo culture and a union is supported in all countries.
And even if it doesn’t lead to an economic miracle, its not going to make our economy worse, so might as well try.
attributes.background: The Canzuk Union would bring our economics closer to the previously mentioned nations encouraging economic growth as well as being able to combat the influence of China.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see a union with Canada, New Zealand and Australia, but we're not sure exactly what you want this to involve.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we could accept a petition calling for the Government to seek to establish free movement of people and goods between the UK, Canada, New Zealand and Australia, if that's what you want to happen.
